document_data.name: ''Backstabber''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Backstabber''''' was the enchanted [[short sword]] that belonged to the young daredevil [[rogue]] [[Tudo]] ''circa'' [[1369 DR]].
document_data.Description: ''Backstabber's'' blade was of jet black color and was significantly slimmer than other short swords.
document_data.Powers: ''Backstabber'' was beautifully balanced, allowing the wielder to land hits with this weapon much easier than with another short sword. This slender blade also had a ''+2'' enchantment and increased the user's dexterity.
document_data.History: ''Backstabber'' belonged to a young rogue Tudo who, won a dare, traveled from [[Hillsfar]] to [[Myth Drannor]] to bring back a piece of [[Castle Cormanthor]] in 1369 DR. He was spotted and imprisoned by the [[Cult of the Dragon]] deep in the Castle's prisons. ''Backstabber'' along with his master worked to bring down the Cult's operation after they were rescued from the prison cell.
